sentences.en: Ever since then I've been longing to meet him face to face.
sentences.cn: 从那时起,我一直渴望和他面对面地聚会.

sentences.en: He gave a longing look at the ice cream.
sentences.cn: 他看了看那冰激凌，显出很想吃的样子。

sentences.en: He has been longing for her ever since she left.
sentences.cn: 自她走后,他一直在想念她.

sentences.en: He was overwhelmed by a longing for times past.
Hearing the tune again sent waves of longing through her.
sentences.cn: 再次听到那首曲子使她胸中充满了渴望.

sentences.en: His heart burned with longing for revenge.
sentences.cn: 他心中燃烧着急欲复仇的怒火.

sentences.en: I have a great longing for home.
I was overwhelmed with longing for those innocent days of early childhood.
sentences.cn: 我内心充满着对纯真的童年时光的怀念。

sentences.en: Imelda spoke of her longing to return home.
sentences.cn: 伊美尔达说她期望能够回家。

sentences.en: She looked back with longing on the good old days.
sentences.cn: 她回首往事，怀念着过去的美好时光。

sentences.en: She was longing for some peace and privacy.
sentences.cn: 她渴望过清静的私人生活。

sentences.en: So this is what you've been longing for.
sentences.cn: 哦,这就是你一直所渴求的东西.

sentences.en: The children are longing for the holidays.
We are longing to see you.

trans.tran_en: feeling or showing that you want sth very much
a strong feeling of wanting something or someone
